name: A Lich's Majesty
description:
HIS MAJESTY

You are an adventurer.  They're the sort of lot who wander into dark caves and spider-infested dungeons.  But this place is different.  How so?  Did you read the title?!

WHAT'S A LICH TO DO?

This lich is lazy, but getting out alive isn't free.  Talk to him and employ all of your cunning.

GAME FEATURES

This game was made with Bitsy.  It includes 3 areas, 7 non-player characters, conditional dialogues, and a ton of loot.  That'd be useful if you could make it out alive.
